contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 16, 2018 D Darwen March and Hymn Tune Contest
Darwen March and Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest (Separate Points)
darwen-march-and-hymn-tune-contest
Market Square, Darwen, Lancashire Best section 2 - Besses Boys (£250), 2nd Farnworth and Walkden(£150). Best section 3 - Hawk Green(£250), 2nd Greenalls(£150). Best section 4 - Cadishead Public(£250), 2nd Brindle(£150). Best youth - Dobcross Youth. Prizes - 1st £700, 2nd £400, 3rd £300. Although Uppermill are a 3rd section band, the fact that they won 3rd overall precludes them from aslo winning the best 3rd section prize. 16 bands competed.
Sept. 16, 2018, 8:16 p.m. Sept. 19, 2018, 8:28 p.m.
1 Marsden Silver Prize Band Alan Widdop
2 Ashton Band Philip Chalk
3 Uppermill Band Dean Redfern
4 Haslingden & Helmshore Band Simon Cowen
5 Besses Boys Band James Holt
6 Hawk Green (Marple) Band Neil Hewson
7 Farnworth and Walkden Band Luke Pallister
8 Greenalls Band Philip Boardman
9 Bolton (Hoover) Band Craig Mann
10 Horwich R.M.I. Jason Smith
11 Skelmersdale Prize Band Ben Coulson
12 Rivington and Adlington Band Malcolm Wilson
13 Cadishead Band David Holland
14 Brindle Band Keith Richmond
15 Dobcross Youth Band Matt Hindle
16 Friezland Band Max Stannard
Withdrawn Coppull and Standish Band Matthew Stringer
